title: Market Volatility, Supply Chain, And The Economy (Podcast)
itunes:title: Market Volatility, Supply Chain, And The Economy (Podcast)
description:
Ron Sanchez, EVP and CIO at Fiduciary Trust Company International, talks about volatile markets and investing on jobs day. Joanie Bily, Chief Workforce Analyst at EmployBridge, talks about employment amid inflation and interest rate hikes. Kurt Sievers, President and CEO of NXP Semiconductors, an American manufacturer with headquarters in the Netherlands, discusses the supply chain, automotive industry, and semiconductor manufacturing. Jeffrey Cleveland, Director and Chief Economist for Payden & Rygel, talks about inflation, labor, and the Fed. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
